title: EP 75 : Research with us on Sandwich Attacks & Arbitrage Bots
description:
Wondering what all the fuss on sandwich attacks is about? Find out everything you need to know - what it is, how it works, and how it impacts the DeFi space in this video. Our researchers Ari, Atharva and Alex deep dived into how they completed the research and what their process looked like.


Please consider donating to help fund these educational videos: 0x6da9AAa73D39F3880119Fd20e6d6a2f65Dd44ABe


Want more in-depth content?

1) The Economics and Math of Token Engineering and DeFi https://book.economicsdesign.com/

2) Academy: https://academy.economicsdesign.com/

3) New research site & dashboard: https://econteric.com/

4) Newsletter: https://economicsdesign.substack.com/
